adHeader: CABINET REFINISHERS/KITCHEN REMODELING (check our website inside)
adDetails: IMPROVE THE LOOK OF YOUR OLD CABINETRY! and experience a dramatic transformation from your kitchen/home office cabinetry to your entertaiment center. Most home owners spend a great deal of time in their kitchens. REFACING OR REFINISHING provide a beautiful new look and years of pride and enjoyment at a fraction of the cost of a complete remodel. KITCHEN MAKE-OVERS provide a great deal of return on the initial investment and is one of the best investments you can make for your house. CAPITOL CITY CABINETS has developed a unique low- cost and fast method to refinish your cabinetry, using a revolutionary new nine-step proces. Literally you will save big dollars! by REFACING OR REFINISHING your existing cabinets rather than replacing them. Call us today for a free home estimate show contact info . Our services include: -COMPLETE KITCHEN REMODELING -CUSTOM CABINETRY -CABINET REFACING -CABINET REFINISHING -CUSTOM MILLWORK -COUNTER TOPS (GRANITE, QUARTZ,SOLID SURFACE) -LIGHTING, ELECTRIC -UNDERCABINET LIGHTING -TILE WORK We can virtually match any type of color and style to the quality of your products and see for your self the quality of our work and the profesionalism of our staff and UP-GRADE YOUR OUT-OF-DATE CABINETRY!. Please visit us on the web http://www.capitolcitycabinets.com (hablamos tu idioma).
